subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jaromir Jagr, who decamped for Russia’s Continental Hockey League after 17 very successful years in the N.H.L., has experienced a combination of joy and sadness playing for Avangard Omsk.
snippet: Jaromir Jagr, who decamped for Russia’s Continental Hockey League after 17 very successful years in the N.H.L., has experienced a combination of joy and sadness playing for Avangard Omsk.
